name: MedAISure Core
description: Core benchmark dataset registry entry aggregating 200 tasks across Diagnostics, Summarization, and Communication.

name: MedAISure Hard
description: Challenging/adversarial cases emphasizing edge conditions and safety-critical diagnostic reasoning.

name: MedAISure Specialty
description: Specialty-focused tasks drawn from subdomains (e.g., cardiology, neurology, oncology, radiology).

name: MedAISure Multimodal (Planned)
description: Planned dataset for multimodal tasks (text + images).
